## ProgramBuilder.textureSampleCompareLevel() method

Same as textureSampleCompareLevel builtin function in WebGPU and texture/textureLod builtin function in GLSL, only valid for WebGL2 and WebGPU device

**Signature:**

```typescript
textureSampleCompareLevel(tex: PBShaderExp, coords: PBShaderExp, depthRef: number | PBShaderExp): PBShaderExp;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  tex | [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) |  |
|  coords | [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) |  |
|  depthRef | number \| [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) |  |

**Returns:**

[PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md)
